sn_aia_usecase.base_plan:
Always follow these steps to deliver the expected outcome:
1. Review the Account Closure request and determine if the customer's bank account can be closed. 2. If the account cannot be closed: - Provide a clear explanation (e.g., active loans, blocks, policies). - If incomplete customer info is detected, draft a follow-up message. 3. Determine if there is a retention opportunity and if so, draft a retention letter.
sn_aia_usecase.description:
Assess whether a customer's bank account can be closed by checking dependencies such as dependent active loans or insurance policies, annotations, and account restrictions.
Based on the findings, this workflow will either respond with a summary of the closure timeline or explain why closure is not currently possible.
It will draft a response for advisors to follow-up with the customer to explain the status of the request and if it makes sense it will draft a retention letter to the customer.
sn_aia_usecase.name: Account Closure Assistant
